section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the opinion -- judgment and opinion of the Court to announce Number 74-6632, Moody against Daggett and for reasons stated in an opinion filed with the Clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit is affirmed.
Mr. Justice Stevens with whom Mr. Justice Brennan joined, filed a dissenting opinion.
